articles.title: Kim Jong Un Watches Men's Football Match
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Watches Men's Football Match
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, watched a men's football match between Sonbong and Hwoebul teams for the Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games at Kim Il Sung Stadium on Monday. 
					 He appeared at the stadium auditorium with Ri Sol Ju.
					
					 The match began with the kick-off by the Sonbong Team. 
					
					 Players of both teams gave fullest play to their spiritual, physical and technical abilities, showing spectacular scenes.
					
					 The Sonbong Team beat the Hwoebul Team 3:0 in the first half of the match.
					
					 In the interval there was a demonstration of model gliders by the Pyongyang Air Club.
					
					 The players of the Hwoebul Team made strong attacks to recover their lost game in the second half, but the match ended in the victory of the Sonbong Team 3:1.
					
					 At the end of the match, supreme leader Kim Jong Un congratulated the footballers on their successful match, kindly acknowledging the cheering spectators.
					
					 Watching the match were Choe Ryong Hae, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Yang Gon, Kwak Pom Gi, Kim Phyong Hae and members of the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission, officials in the field of sports, sportspersons, youth and students and working citizens.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary 
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Tuesday to celebrate the 103rd birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju and other leading officials of the party, state and army, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, Cabinet, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, officers and men of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials of institutions and industrial establishments in the city, bereaved families of revolutionary martyrs, labor innovators, overseas Koreans' delegations, overseas Koreans and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were foreign diplomatic envoys, representatives of international organizations and military attaches of foreign embassies here and foreign guests.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, made a report at the meeting.
					
					 The reporter said that Kim Il Sung's birth was a great fortune for the Korean people as they acclaimed the sun of Juche for the first time in the history spanning five thousand years and a worldwide event which brought progressive mankind the dawn in the era of independence.
					
					 He was the founding-father of socialist Korea and the eternal sun of Juche as he brought about a fundamental turn in hewing out the destiny of the country, the nation and mankind and opened up their brilliant future, standing in the centre of the revolutionary movement in the stirring 20th century, the reporter said, and went on:
					
					 He performed undying feats in the history of the revolutionary struggle of the Korean people and the world history of politics, hewing the untrodden path for the country and its people for seven decades since he embarked upon the road of revolution in his teens.
					
					 His revolutionary career was a sacred one of the peerlessly great man who provided assets guaranteeing the eternal future of the Korean revolution from scratch without any foundation and preceding experience.
					
					 He did everything he could for the future of the revolution and comprehensively provided the scientific guiding idea, invincible traditions, the most advantageous social system and strong national power, leaving them as legacies for eternity.
					
					 He clarified the revolutionary principles that the revolution should be made independently and creatively by believing in the strength of the people and relying on it and the independence and sovereignty of the nation and the victory of the revolutionary cause are guaranteed by arms, and founded the immortal Juche idea and the Songun idea.
					
					 After taking over two pistols as revolutionary legacies and embarking on the road of the Songun revolution, he led the bloody anti-Japanese war to victory, liberated the country and won a shining victory in the hard-fought Fatherland Liberation War against the U.S. imperialists' invasion, exalting the honor of the nation.
					
					 Basing himself on the precious experience and traditions established during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, he built the revolutionary party, state power and regular revolutionary armed forces of Juche type in a short span of time after the liberation of the country and steadily strengthened the Workers' Party of Korea, state and army with his experienced and tested leadership.
					
					 He wisely led the two-stage rehabilitation and construction, two-stage social revolution and socialist construction, turning the DPRK into the socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence. He successfully applied the general line of socialist construction and thus gave full play to the advantages and might of socialism in all fields of politics, economy, military affairs and culture.
					
					 He was the lodestar of national reunification as he devoted his all to the great national unity and the reunification of the country and the world elder statesman who dynamically led the human cause of independence.
					
					 His idea and feats were steadfastly carried forward by leader Kim Jong Il and they are shedding their rays in the new century under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The reporter called upon all party members, service personnel and people to hold Kim Il Sung in high esteem as the sun of Juche for all ages with the national pride and honor of living and struggling as his descendants. 
					
					 Similar meetings took place in provinces, cities, counties and complexes that day.

articles.title: Joint Press Release on DPRK FM's India Visit
articles.content:
Joint Press Release on DPRK FM's India Visit 
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A joint press release on India visit by the DPRK foreign minister was published in New Delhi on April 14.
					 According to the report, DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong and his party paid an official visit to the Republic of India from April 12 to 14 at the invitation of its Foreign Minister Sushma Swaraj. 
					
					 Ri Su Yong paid a courtesy call on Mohammad Hamid Ansari, vice-president of India, had talks with Foreign Minister Sushma Swaraj and met with some businessmen. 
					
					 At the talks both sides exchanged views on the issue of boosting the friendly relations between the two countries in political, economic, cultural and other fields and regional and international matters and reached a consensus of views on the issues discussed.
					
					 Ri officially invited the Indian foreign minister to visit the DPRK at a convenient time. The invitation was accepted with pleasure.

articles.title: President of Sao Tome and Principe Supports DPRK
articles.content:
President of Sao Tome and Principe Supports DPRK 
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- DPRK Ambassador Kim Hyon Il on April 2 presented his credentials to Manuel Pinto Da Costa, president of Sao Tome and Principe. 
					 The president said the two countries have maintained historically deep and long-standing relations of friendship and cooperation. 
					
					 He noted that whenever hearing the news of the energetic leadership provided by respected HE Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the cause of HE Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il, he recollected the days of his visit to the DPRK.
					
					 Still fresh in my memory is the time when I had the honor of being received by President Kim Il Sung, he said, adding: 
					
					 HE Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il were the great and tender-hearted benefactors of the people of Sao Tome and Principe as they rendered material and moral assistance to them in their efforts for building a new society. 
					
					 I am sincerely rejoiced over the fact that the Korean people united around HE Kim Jong Un as one are firmly defending the sovereignty of the country and continue achieving big successes in all fields true to the noble cause of the preceding leaders. 
					
					 The people of Sao Tome and Principe will invariably support the Korean people in their efforts to ensure peace on the Korean peninsula and their cause of independent reunification.

articles.title: National Martial Art Championship for Mangyongdae Prize Opens
articles.content:
National Martial Art Championship for Mangyongdae Prize Opens
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The National Martial Art Championship for Mangyongdae Prize opened in Taekwon-Do Hall on April 14 with due ceremony on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 It brought together more than 600 men and women players selected from 25 organizations including Taekwon-Do teams all over the country. They will compete in Taekwon-Do, go and other events at the Taekwon-Do Hall and other places.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and officials concerned.
					
					 Kim Kyong Ho, chairman of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee, made an opening address.
					
					 Then followed demonstrations by players and instructors of the National Taekwon-Do Team.

articles.title: DPRK Men's Team Wins Int'l Ice Hockey Games
articles.content:
DPRK Men's Team Wins Int'l Ice Hockey Games 
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The DPRK men's team placed first at the 2015 IIHF Ice Hockey World Championship Division III which started in Izmir, Turkey on April 3. 
					 The DPRK team defeated Bosnia-Herzegovina 13:0, Georgia 12:4, United Arab Emirates 7:0, Luxembourg 5:2 and Hong Kong of China 9:0. 
					
					 It defeated Turkey 4:3 in the last game on April 12, placing first. 
					
					 It is qualified to take part in the 2016 IIHF Ice Hockey World Championship Division II Group B.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Bashar Al-Assad, president of Syria, on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) and the third anniversary of Kim Jong Il's election to the top posts of the Workers' Party of Korea and the state.
					 The floral basket was handed to an official concerned on Tuesday by Syrian Ambassador to the DPRK Tammam Sulaiman.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to 17th Kimilsungia Festival from Japanese Horticulturist
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to 17th Kimilsungia Festival from Japanese Horticulturist
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Mototeru Kamo, a Japanese horticulturist who succeeded in cultivating the immortal Kimjongilia, sent a congratulatory message to the 17th Kimilsungia festival being held with splendor  on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The message warmly congratulated the Korean people on holding the grand festival in April, adding that Kimilsungias will be in full bloom as immortal flower along with the great august name of the President.

articles.title: Third-day Performances of People's Art Festival Given
articles.content:
Third-day Performances of People's Art Festival Given
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Third-day performances of the 4th April Spring People's Art Festival took place before full houses in Pyongyang on April 14.
					 Artistes from each provincial art troupe and members of art squads, itinerant art squads and art groups truthfully represented the firm faith of all service personnel and people to glorify the time which passes along with songs lauding President Kim Il Sung, the sun, as a history of eternal victories and glory.
					
					 In such numbers as female folk song solo "We Will Never Forget All Sorts of Hardships the Leader Weathered ", male solo "We Live under Care of the Leader", performers praised the revolutionary career of the President who performed undying revolutionary feats for the prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					 Among the numbers were songs in praise of the undying leadership feats leader Kim Jong Il performed by leading the country and people only to victory in the drive to defend socialism.
					
					 They impressively represented deep reverence of all the service personnel and people for Marshal Kim Jong Un who is following the road of devoted service to his people the way the great leaders did.
					
					 Performances continue.

articles.title: Exhibition of Successes in Culinary Art Held
articles.content:
Exhibition of Successes in Culinary Art Held
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- An exhibition of successes in the culinary art took place on the sidelines of the 20th Cooking Festival held here on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (April 15), the birthday of President Kim Il Sung.
					 On display there were more than 100 exhibits presented by 10-odd public service establishments.
					
					 They include cuisines which won patents, new kinds of recipes, cooking utensils, dish-related papers, books, multi-media items and albums.
					
					 What caught the visitors' eyes were exhibits presented by Chongnyon Hotel, Chongryu Restaurant, Changgwang Public Service Management Bureau and Kyonghung Restaurant.
					
					 The exhibition served as a significant occasion in improving the local cooking technologies and the way of people's diet.

articles.title: Diplomatic Corps, Military Attaches Corps, Economic and Commercial Councilors Corps Visit Venue of Kimilsungia Festival
articles.content:
Diplomatic Corps, Military Attaches Corps, Economic and Commercial Councilors Corps Visit Venue of Kimilsungia Festival
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the diplomatic corps, the military attaches corps and the economic and commercial councilors corps here visited the venue of the 17th Kimilsungia festival on April 14 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They looked round the festival venue crowded with immortal Kimilsungias.
					
					 The diplomatic corps visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum on the same day.

articles.title: Participants in People's Art Festival Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Participants in People's Art Festival Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The participants in the Fourth April Spring People's Art Festival visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on Tuesday.
					 They laid bouquets and flowers before the graves of Kim Po Hyon and Ri Po Ik, grandparents of the President, and the graves of Kim Hyong Jik and Kang Pan Sok, his parents, and paid silent tribute to them.
					
					 They visited the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum. At his old home in Mangyongdae, they went round historic relics, recollecting the revolutionary career of the President, who devoted his all to the country and its people, and of his family members in Mangyongdae.
					
					 They also visited the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong.
					
					 They laid flowers before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk before paying tribute to it.
					
					 They also visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats for National Reunification Praised by Chief of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats for National Reunification Praised by Chief of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, was interviewed by KCNA on Tuesday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Recorded in the history of the movement for Korea's reunification is total dedication made by the President to achieving the great national unity, Jo said, and went on:
					
					 It was the intention of the President to repulse the domination and intervention by foreign forces and reunify the country independently and peacefully by the concerted efforts of the Koreans.
					
					 He regarded it as the mainstay for reunification to achieve the great national unity from the very day the country was divided and wisely led the struggle to attain it.
					
					 The three principles of national reunification, the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation, the most fair and aboveboard and realistic proposals for reunification, are associated with the patriotic soul and noble desire of the President for reunification.
					
					 It was the President who valued the national conscience and patriotism of all persons desirous of national reunification, regardless of their past, helped them glorify their spirit like gem and led them along the patriotic road for reunification.
					
					 A new history of the great national unity began and the movement for national reunification could dynamically advance thanks to the President, the sun, who led to the last those people in whom he reposed trust once.
					
					 The undying feats he performed by achieving the great national unity will shine for all ages together with the history of the movement for reunification.

articles.title: Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Delegations of Juche Idea Study Organizations
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Delegations of Juche Idea Study Organizations
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received gifts from the visiting delegation of the Study Forum for Self-Reliance of Nepal, Mongolian delegation of organizations for the study of the Juche idea and the chairman of the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India, and his party on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The gifts were conveyed to officials concerned on Tuesday by head of the Nepali delegation Subash Kaji Shrestha, chairman of the Study Forum for Self-Reliance of Nepal, head of the Mongolian delegation TS. Minjbadgar, chief of the Omnogov Provincial Branch of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, and Vipin Gupta, chairman of the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India.
					
					 The delegation of the Russian Institute of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the delegation of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea presented a gift to Kim Jong Un in their joint name on the same day.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Organization and Personages
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Organizations, Personages
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received floral baskets from the Hyogo Prefectural People's Council for Japan-DPRK Friendship, the Singapore- DPRK Exchange Society, the family of former Vice Prime Minister of Japan Sin Kanemaru and Jindallae Saphariny, president of the Jindallae Children's Foundation, on Tuesday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 He also received floral baskets from the Song Ju Company of the Experimental Primary School of Fusong County and Yuwen Middle School in Jilin of China.

articles.title: Economic and Commercial Councilors Corps Pays Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Economic and Commercial Councilors Corps Pays Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The economic and commercial councilors corps here visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on April 14 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of the President (the Day of the Sun).
					 They placed a floral basket before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Delegation of General Association of Koreans in China Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Delegation of General Association of Koreans in China Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China led by Vice-Chairman Cha Sang Bo visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 At the old home in Mangyongdae, the members of the delegation went round historic relics preserved with care, being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President and his family members in Mangyongdae.
					
					 At the end of the visit the head of the delegation said:
					
					 Visiting Mangyongdae on the occasion of the significant Day of the Sun, I recollect his undying feats.
					
					 The President embarked on the road of revolution in his early years and made long journeys of bloody anti-Japanese battles, liberating the country and saving the destiny of the Korean nation. 
					
					 The homeland is demonstrating its dignity and honor as an invincible power. This would have been unthinkable without his great feats.
					
					 The revolutionary cause of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il is being successfully carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un and the great feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will always shine along with the history of the eternally prospering Kim Il Sung's nation.

articles.title: Message of Thanks to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
articles.content:
Message of Thanks to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un received a message of thanks from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on April 13.
					 We received with great excitement the educational aid fund and stipends amounting to 238.04 million yen sent by the Marshal in the 161st installment, the message said.
					
					 The Chongryon Central Standing Committee extends the highest glory and warmest thanks to the Marshal for showing ceaseless loving care for the development of national education, representing profound reverence and loyalty of all the officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan, it noted, adding:
					
					 We will consolidate the ranks of all educators to be ones of overseas educators holding the Marshal in high esteem as the only center of unity and leadership, bearing deep in mind the faith that we are sure to win despite any storm and stress as we are led by you and the unshakable will that it is honor to weather any hardship and ordeal as we are steered by you.
					
					 We will make a tangible contribution to building a thriving nation, though we are living in Japan, and dynamically conduct the work for national unity and thus glorify this year as a year of opening up a wide avenue to independent reunification and more firmly build up the ranks of supporters and sympathizers with Chongryon and national education through positive external activities.
					
					 All the officials and compatriots will single-mindedly unite and  register signal achievements in the national education in  this significant year marking the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation and the 60th anniversary of the formation of Chongryon and thus live up to the profound loving care of the Marshal with loyalty.

articles.title: Austrians Here
articles.content:
Austrians Here
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Oliver Jonischkeit, federal secretary of the Left Bloc of the Austrian Trade Union Federation, and his party arrived here Tuesday.

articles.title: Signboard "Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill" Opens to Public
articles.content:
Signboard "Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill" Opens to Public
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A signboard written by Marshal Kim Jong Un was put on the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill.
					 He visited the mill several times and showed loving care for it. He presented its employees with the signboard "Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill". 
					
					 The signboard was placed there with due ceremony on Tuesday.

articles.title: New Homepage Opens in DPRK
articles.content:
New Homepage Opens in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A new homepage named "Yolphung" has opened to service in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, attracting an increasing number of subscribers.
					 The homepage has a wide range of sci-tech database necessary not only for scientists but for workers and peasants.
					
					 It offers sci-tech data in various fields and informs of new technologies and the trend of world sci-tech development as well as diverse common knowledge about health, ways for longevity and ecological environment.
					
					 What come under attraction in it are video clips on the world's latest science and technologies.
					
					 Any subscriber can get access to the homepage with mobile phone.

articles.title: Japan's Distortion of History under Fire
articles.content:
Japan's Distortion of History under Fire 
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- These days Japan is getting ever more undisguised in its ambition for reinvading the Korean peninsula through distortion of history. 
					 According to south Korean media, the Agency of Culture under the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan posted on its website on April 8 an article distorting some of cultural treasures which the Japanese imperialists looted in Korea during the period of Three Kingdoms as those dating back to "Imna era". 
					
					 This is a sinister plot to justify the story of "Mimana Miyake" meaning "Japan's government agency of Imna" cooked up by paid historians of Japan and its colonial rule over Korea at any cost. 
					
					 "Mimana Miyake" was nothing but a temporary administrative organ of the Yamato regime established in Kaya state of Korea in Okayama Prefecture in West Japan around the sixth century.
					
					 Nevertheless, Japan raised pseudo-scientific theory that the Japanese army of the Yamato regime which did not exist in the fourth century dominated the area south of the River Han for hundreds of years after occupying Kaya (Imna) area in southern Korea only to become a laughing stock of the world. The Japanese authorities are, however, peddling it to make the world recognize it. 
					
					 The Japanese government is pushing ahead with distortion of history in real earnest in the wake of its clarification of its stand to exercise the "right to collective self-defense" through changed interpretation of its Pacifist Constitution last year. This clearly indicates that the Japanese reactionaries' sinister scenario to reinvade Korea by justifying the colonial rule over Korea in the past has entered the phase of its implementation.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Accuses S. Korean Regime of Its Sycophancy toward U.S.
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Accuses S. Korean Regime of Its Sycophancy toward U.S.
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet regime is getting ever more undisguised in pursuing sycophancy and treachery and escalating confrontation with the compatriots in the north.
					 Park Geun Hye, puppet chief executive of south Korea, when meeting the U.S. secretary of Defense at Chongwadae on Apr. 10, said "it is the best strategy to contain the north through conditional transfer of right to wartime operation command and maintenance of solid south Korea-U.S. alliance." She, at the same time, made nonsensical remarks that the DPRK's nuclear development, missile launch and cyber attack are posing threat to south Korea and other parts of the world.
					
					 At the confab with the U.S. held earlier, the puppet group was so ridiculous as to call for "effectively operating combined missile defence network" to cope with the "nuclear and missile threat from the north" and to claim that the south Korea-U.S. "alliance" is a "core of peace and stability in Northeast Asia."
					
					 The nukes and missiles to which the DPRK had access by tightening its belt are a treasure common to all Koreans in the north, south and overseas. Thanks to them, the Koreans live on this land free from war disasters. Yet, the puppet group is so foolish as to persist in its nonsensical trumpeting about "threat" from the nukes and missiles.
					
					 It is an unpardonable thrice-cursed act of treachery that the Park Geun Hye group is keen on "tightening alliance" with the U.S. while pulling up the DPRK over its nukes and missiles that serve as a strong deterrent for preventing the U.S. from igniting a nuclear war and treasured sword for protecting the destiny of the country and all Koreans.
					
					 The puppet group is working with blood-shot eyes to escalate confrontation with the compatriots in the north and tighten "alliance" with the U.S. in a bid to calm down the indignation running high among the south Korean people against the man-killing "government" one year since the ferry Sewol sinking disaster and divert elsewhere the public opinion.
					
					 While keeping mum about the U.S. nukes and missiles that have brought constant danger of war to the Korean peninsula, the puppet group has desperately cried out for eliminating the self-defensive treasured sword that guarantees the peace and security of the nation, and "resolutely coping with it" in collusion with outsiders.
					
					 Under the pretext of "checking infiltration" and "coping with threat" from the north, it is getting hell-bent on importing U.S.-made war hardware as evidenced by its recent decision to purchase 400 Hellfire missiles and 136 new-type Patriot missiles.
					
					 It has staged large-scale war drills including Foal Eagle one after another in league with its master U.S., disturbing peace and escalating the danger of war on the Korean peninsula and in its vicinity.
					
					 All facts go to clearly prove who threatens peace and security on the peninsula and in other parts of the world.
					
					 The puppet group is working hard to evade the blame for the escalating tension by noisily trumpeting about "threat" from the north but it can never conceal its true colors as war maniacs bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It is foolish for the puppet group to try to prolong its remaining days by depending on outsiders while turning its back on compatriots. 
					
					 However, it will only precipitate its final destruction.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Authorities' Moves to Eliminate DPRK's Nuclear Deterrence
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Authorities' Moves to Eliminate DPRK's Nuclear Deterrence 
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean chief executive, when meeting with a delegation of the U.S House of Representatives, talked rubbish that the "nuclear issue of the north" is a big "threat to security" and a "serious destabilizing factor" of posing a threat to the peace in Northeast Asia and the world and the north is following the "road of isolation, rejecting changes" and the "unification" of the Korean peninsula is "a solution to  the nuclear issue of the north".
					 Yun Pyong Se, south Korean puppet foreign minister, grumbled that the "north is refusing the dialogue for denuclearization while sticking to the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts".
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary terms their utterances rigmarole and sophism that can be let loose only by stooges of the U.S. bereft of any elementary national self-respect and ability to judge the situation.
					
					 The puppet group should repent of the crimes it perpetrated by staging ceaseless nuclear war drills against the north in collusion with outside forces, spawning the nuclear issue on the peninsula and blocking its solution before talking about the "threat" from the north, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is the height of folly for the puppet group to work hard to eliminate the nuclear deterrent of the DPRK.
					
					 The puppet group's reckless moves for achieving "unification of social systems" will only result in the miserable end of the U.S. corrupt colonial ruling system and "liberal democracy".
					
					 They should stop dreaming of the north's "dismantlement of nukes." 
					
					 The DPRK's denuclearization will never happen unless the U.S. hostile policy toward it is rolled back and the latter's nuclear threat to the former defused and the world is free from nukes.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Accuses Puppet Chief Executive
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Accuses Puppet Chief Executive
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Media Today in an article on April 8 accused the puppet chief executive of her improper attitude toward the ferry Sewol disaster.
					 At the meeting of chief secretaries of Chongwadae on April 6 the present chief executive termed the ferry Sewol disaster "accident", the article recalled, terming Park Geun Hye as a bad "president" as she was reluctant to call the ferry Sewol disaster a disaster.
					
					 The ferry Sewol case was a great disaster caused by the incompetence of the regime as it was quite possible to rescue many children, it held.
					
					 Expressing resentment at the chief executive's attitude, it urged the authorities to unconditionally start the operation to salvage the ferry immediately.

articles.title: Meeting of Koreans in Japan Held to Mark Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Meeting of Koreans in Japan Held to Mark Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung
 Tokyo, April 12 (KNS-KCNA) -- A meeting of Koreans in Japan took place at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo on April 11 in celebration of the 103rd birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 It was attended by Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon); Pae Ik Ju, its vice-chairman; Pae Jin Gu, its vice-chairman and secretary general; Pak Ku Ho, its vice-chairman; Hong In Hum, chairman of the Central Audit Committee of Chongryon; advisors and department directors of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon; the permanent advisor and the director of the Research Institute on History of Korean Residents in Japan; leading officials of organizations and enterprises of Chongryon; chairpersons of the Chongryon Headquarters and officials of Chongryon in Kanto Area; Koreans in Japan; and teachers and students of Korean University.
					
					 Ho Jong Man in a report referred, first of all, to the fact that supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent educational aid fund and stipends amounting to 238.04 million yen on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The President is always remembered by the world people as a prominent leader, peerless patriot and the sun of mankind as he performed undying feats unprecedented in the history of the Korean nation spanning thousands of years and carved out a rosy future of Juche Korea.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il projected Chongryon as pride of the country and the nation and the vanguard and model of the movement of overseas Koreans in the world by working heart and soul throughout his revolutionary life.
					
					 The undying feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il are shining more brilliantly thanks to Kim Jong Un, and their revolutionary careers are given steady continuity as the history of the sun.
					
					 Ho called upon the Koreans in Japan to unite single-mindedly and advance in sky-high spirit to usher in a new heyday in the movement of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was read out at the meeting.
					
					 A lecture was given by the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon that day on the same occasion.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held by the Nidjegorod Regional Branch and the Yaroslav Regional Branch of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Maritime Territorial Branch of the All-Russia War Veterans' Social Organization "Militant Fraternity" on April 6 and 8 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 The chairman of the Nidjegorod Regional Branch of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea said:
					
					 The President was an outstanding leader and great revolutionary in the 20th century who embarked upon the road of revolution in his early years, liberated his country through the anti-Japanese armed struggle and built a socialist power. 
					
					 The DPRK is dynamically pushing forward the building of an economic power and highly civilized country under the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 It is demonstrating its might as a military power and nuclear weapons state.
					
					 All the victories and achievements in the DPRK are ascribable to the wise guidance of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chairperson of the Yaroslav Regional Branch of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung was the founder of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK and is the eternal President of the DPRK.
					
					 The Korean people are holding him in high esteem as the father of the nation and the eternal leader.
					
					 The chairman of the Maritime Territorial Branch of the All-Russia War Veterans' Social Organization "Militant Fraternity" praised the President as a prominent statesman, peerless strategist and tender-hearted father of the people.

articles.title: Japanese Bodies Condemn Authorities' Suppression of Chongryon
articles.content:
Japanese Bodies Condemn Authorities' Suppression of Chongryon
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Japanese organizations issued statements on April 1 to denounce the authorities for their reckless suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The Buraku Liberation League of Japan recalled that the police corps of the joint investigation headquarters made up of policemen of Kyoto, Kanagawa, Yamaguchi and Shimane prefectures searched the houses of the chairman and a vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee under the pretext of "violation of foreign currency law". This is a politically-motivated suppression of Chongryon by the Japanese government, it noted, adding:
					
					 Japan-DPRK relations have not improved due to the Abe regime.
					
					 The recent search will further bedevil these relations. The human rights issue of Japan is being raised even at the UN.
					
					 The search is a discrimination against Koreans in Japan.
					
					 We condemn the suppression of Chongryon and strongly demand the Abe regime opt for mending Japan-DPRK relations with sincerity.
					
					 The All-Japan Trade Union of Harbor Workers said:
					
					 The government's atrocity such as search of the houses of the chairman and a vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee is an act made without reason and a political crime aimed to bar Japan-DPRK relations from being improved and to incite hostility of both sides.
					
					 Lurking behind the search is a political, threatening and discriminative intention.
					
					 We hardly repress astonishment at the vulgarity and incompetence of the Abe regime.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Romanian Party on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Romanian Party on Its Website 
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The full text of Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was posted by the Party for Socialist Choice of Romania on its website on April 7.
					 The work published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012) deals with the revolutionary exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in their lifetimes.
					
					 It indicates the tasks for firmly upholding and preserving the idea and exploits of the President and Kim Jong Il and eternally glorifying them.

articles.title: Honorary Citizenship of Ecuadorian City Awarded to Peerlessly Great Persons of DPRK
articles.content:
Honorary Citizenship of Ecuadorian City Awarded to Peerlessly Great Persons of DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The title of honorary citizenship of Chordeleg City of Ecuador was awarded to President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il, anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 A ceremony of conveying the certificate of honorary citizenship took place on April 6.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were personages of the city government, the Ecuadorian national preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung), the Canar Provincial Institute for the Friendship and Solidarity with DPRK and the Ecuadorian Committee for Supporting Korea's Independent and Peaceful Reunification, Ecuadorians and members of the group of Korean doctors for helping in Koryo medicine working there.
					
					 The citizenship certificate was handed to the head of the group.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Russian Papers
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Russian Papers
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Russian papers each devoted one whole page to a special write-up illustrated with a portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung and his photos on his birth anniversary.
					 The papers also carried a photo of the statues of the President and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Komsomolskaya Pravda on March 31 said in an article titled "The eternal sun" the President clearly indicated the road to be followed by humankind with bright rays of the sun, provided a flower garden of humanity with its warmth and embraced all peoples with great attraction.
					
					 His warm love for people was not confined to the Korean people only, the paper noted, praising his noble personality and warm humanity as a great man who admired many people of the world. 
					
					 The paper on April 4 carried an article lauding the President who is remembered by progressive humankind as a model of genuine internationalists. 
					
					 The April 8-15 issue of Moskovskii Komsomolets said in an article titled "A model of internationalists" the President rendered sincere help to the Chinese revolution and defended Russia with arms in the days of hard-fought anti-Japanese war. After the liberation of the country he rendered unreserved support to various countries and nations in their anti-imperialist struggle, it noted.
					
					 Khabarovsk Ekspres on April 8 carried accounts of the President's visits to the Soviet Union in the articles captioned "Our city remembers Comrade Kim Il Sung".
					
					 The President's idea and exploits are shining forever as the sun does though he passed away, it noted, adding: Many countries conferred upon him honorary titles, orders and gifts in his lifetime and even after his demise.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Thai Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Thai Organizations
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Thai organizations issued statements on April 5 and 8 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand said:
					
					 The President was a great thinker and theoretician and outstanding statesman.
					
					 He authored the immortal Juche idea and built the most advantageous socialist state.
					
					 The DPRK has emerged a power standing firm in confrontation with the U.S. This would be unthinkable without his wise leadership.
					
					 Great, indeed, are the exploits performed by him for the country and the nation. 
					
					 The Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association said:
					
					 The President founded the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and devoted himself to bringing the happiest life to the people.
					
					 He rendered sincere support to the people of many countries in their national liberation struggle and the building of a new society. 
					
					 He is a peerless patriot and the sun of humankind as he dedicated himself to the prosperity of the country and the global cause of independence all his life.
					
					 Though he passed away, his great exploits will always be remembered not only by the Korean people but by progressive humankind.

articles.title: Beninese Party Denounces Japanese Authorities' Suppression of Chongryon
articles.content:
Beninese Party Denounces Japanese Authorities' Suppression of Chongryon 
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The Socialist Party of Benin on April 8 made public a statement in denunciation of the Japanese authorities' brigandish suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon). 
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Japanese police authorities searched the houses of the chairman and a vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon who are deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK by mobilizing even armored cars . 
					
					 The search was illegal hooliganism and unpardonable violation of rights of Koreans in Japan and national discrimination against them. 
					
					 The suppression of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan is infringement upon the DPRK. 
					
					 The atrocities of the Japanese authorities are a product of their political plot to tone down public opinion demanding apology and reparation for the past crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists and deliberately lay an obstacle in the way of improving the DPRK-Japan relations. 
					
					 We vehemently condemn the illegal suppression of Chongryon which plays the role as a diplomatic mission of the DPRK as violation of human rights and unpardonable infringement upon its sovereignty.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Mexican Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Mexican Organization
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A gist of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Hold the Great Leader Forever in High Esteem and Accomplish His Cause" was carried by the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea in its bulletin on April 5.
					 The work, published on Oct. 16, Juche 83 (1994), indicates the tasks and ways of defending the revolutionary cause of President Kim Il Sung and accomplishing it, including the issue of consolidating the party and strengthening the single-minded unity of the leader, party and masses, the issue of thoroughly carrying out the party's revolutionary economic strategy and the issue of strengthening the People's Army and establishing the social trait of attaching importance to military affairs.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia partido de futbol de Torneo Deportivo por Premio Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia partido de futbol de Torneo Deportivo por Premio Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, 14 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio el partido de futbol masculino entre los equipos Sonbong y Hwaebul que tuvo lugar el dia 13 en el capitalino Estadio Kim Il Sung en el marco del Torneo Deportivo por el Premio Mangyongdae.
					El salio a la tribuna junto con Ri Sol Ju.
					
					En el juego iniciado con el saque del Sonbong, los futbolistas de ambos equipos demostraron excelentes jugadas haciendo uso de su capacidad ideo-espiritual, fisica y tecnica.
					
					En la primera mitad, el Sonbong gano al Hwaebul por 3 a cero.
					
					Durante el receso, el Club de Aviacion de Pyongyang ofrecio la demostracion modelo de aeromodelismo.
					
					En la segunda mitad, los muchachos del equipo Hwaebul iniciaron una ofensiva intrepida para recuperar los puntos perdidos.
					
					El juego termino con el marcador de 3 a 1 a favor del Sonbong.
					
					Finalizado el partido, Kim Jong Un felicito los exitos de los jugadores respondiendo con su mano alzada a las efusivas aclamaciones de la multitud.
					
					Entre los espectadores figuraban Choe Ryong Hae, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Yang Gon, Kwak Pom Gi, Kim Phyong Hae, los miembros del Comite Estatal de Direccion de Deportes, los funcionarios de la rama deportiva, los deportistas, los estudiantes y jovenes y los trabajadores de diferentes sectores.

articles.title: Acto central por 103o aniversario de natalicio de Kim Il Su
articles.content:
Acto central por 103o aniversario de natalicio de Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 14 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 14 en el capitalino Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang el acto central por el 103o aniversario del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung. 
					Asistieron Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, el consejo de ministros, las entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, funcionarios de organismos, fabricas y empresas de esta capital, familiares de martires revolucionarios, innovadores laborales, compatriotas y sus delegaciones de visita en la patria y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang. 
					
					Fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales y los agregados militares, acreditados en Corea y otros huespedes extranjeros. 
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					El informante senalo que el nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung fue una gran fortuna del pueblo coreano y un acontecimiento mundial que permitio al pueblo coreano acoger el Sol del Juche por primera vez en la historia nacional de cinco milenios e ilumino el camino a seguir por la humanidad progresista en la era de la independencia. 
					
					El Presidente Kim Il Sung, fundador de la Corea socialista y eterno Sol del Juche, trajo el cambio radical en la forja del destino de la patria, la nacion y la humanidad conduciendo el movimiento revolucionario del siglo XX, afirmo y continuo:
					
					Al emprender a su tierna edad el camino de la revolucion, el Presidente dejo durante 70 anos indelebles proezas en la historia de la lucha revolucionaria del pueblo coreano y la de la politica mundial abriendo el camino inexplorado en pro de la patria y el pueblo. 
					
					La vida revolucionaria del Presidente fue la sagrada del gran hombre sin igual que asento sobre la ruina la base de eterna duracion de la revolucion coreana sin tener algun fundamento ni la experiencia. 
					
					Hizo todo lo posible por el futuro de la revolucion y preparo la cientifica idea directriz, las invencibles tradiciones, el mas ventajoso regimen social y el fuerte poderio estatal. 
					
					Aclaro los principios de la revolucion de que se debe hacer la revolucion de manera independiente y creativa confiando en las fuerzas del pueblo y ateniendose a ellas y residen en las fuerzas armadas la independencia de la nacion y la victoria de la causa revolucionaria, y concibio la inmortal idea Juche, la del Songun. 
					
					Recibio de su padre dos pistolas como herencia revolucionaria y emprendio el camino de la revolucion del Songun. Al conducir a la victoria la guerra antijaponesa rescato la patria y logro relevante victoria en la ardua Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria contra la invasion armada del imperialismo norteamericano. 
					
					A base de las nobles experiencias y tradiciones adquiridas en el periodo de la lucha armada antijaponesa, construyo en el corto plazo despues de la liberacion del pais el partido revolucionario, el poder estatal y las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias regulares de tipo jucheano y desarrollo incesantemente con su probada y veterana orientacion el Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Estado y el ejercito. 
					
					Al conducir sabiamente la reconstruccion en dos ocasiones y la revolucion social de dos etapas y la construccion socialista, convirtio la RPDC en la potencia socialista caracterizada por la independencia, la autarquia y la autodefensa y manifesto la superioridad y poderio del socialismo en todos los aspectos como la politica, la economia, los asuntos militares y la cultura mediante la materializacion de la linea general de la construccion socialista.
					
					El Presidente hizo todo lo posible por la gran unidad nacional y la reintegracion territorial del pais y dirigio con dinamismo la causa de la independencia de la humanidad. 
					
					La idea y las proezas del Presidente se llevaron adelante por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y brillan siglo tras siglo bajo la guia del Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Todos los militantes del partido, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular y los habitantes con el orgullo nacional de vivir y luchar como descendientes de Kim Il Sung deben apoyar generacion tras generacion al Presidente como Sol del Juche.
					
					Este dia, fueron efectuados tambien en todas las provincias, ciudades, distritos y complejos los actos por el 103o aniversario del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores de presidente sirio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores de presidente sirio
Pyongyang, 14 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio un cesto de flores que con motivo del Dia del Sol y del 3o aniversario de la eleccion del Mariscal en el supremo cargo del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el Estado, le enviara el presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria, Bashar al-Assad.
					  El embajador sirio en Corea, Tammam Sulaiman, lo entrego el dia 14 a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: Mototeru Kamo felicita XVII Festival de Kimilsungias
articles.content:
Mototeru Kamo felicita XVII Festival de Kimilsungias
Pyongyang, 14 de abril (ACNC) -- Para felicitar el XVII Festival de Kimilsungias que tiene lugar con motivo del dia de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el horticultor japones Mototeru Kamo, quien creo la inmortal flor kimjongilia, envio un mensaje de felicitacion.
					La misiva felicita calurosamente el XVII Festival de Kimilsungias que se efectua solemnemente en abril y anade que kimilsungia florecera plenamente como flor inmortal con  el nombre del Presidente.

articles.title: Lideres coreanos reciben titulo de ciudadano honorario de ciudad ecuatoriana Chordeleg
articles.content:
Lideres coreanos reciben titulo de ciudadano honorario de ciudad ecuatoriana Chordeleg
Pyongyang, 14 de abril (ACNC) -- El Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk y el Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibieron el titulo de ciudadano de la ciudad de Chordeleg del Ecuador.
					Tuvo lugar el dia 6 la ceremonia de entrega del dicho titulo.
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes las personalidades del gobierno de la ciudad de Chordeleg, el comite preparatorio nacional del Ecuador por el Dia del Sol, el Instituto provincial de Canar del Ecuador por la Amistad y la Solidaridad con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el Comite Ecuatoriano de Apoyo a la Reunificacion Independiente y Pacifica de Corea y las masas, asi como los miembros de la  delegacion de cooperacion de medicina Coryo de Corea que trabaja en este pais centroamericano.
					
					En la ceremonia fue entregado al jefe de la delegacion coreana el certificado de ciudadano honorario dirigido a los grandes hombres del monte Paektu.
